DOC.brief_summary: Patients with Parkinson's disease will be seen by a dermatologist who will biopsy any suspicious skin lesions.
DOC.brief_title: A Survey Study to See if Patients Diagnosed With Parkinson's Disease Have Higher Incidence of Melanoma
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis Parkinson's disease Patient able and willing to give informed consent Patient must not be taking any investigational drug at the time of enrollment unconfirmed, undocumented Parkinson's disease unable to give consent taking any investigational product
